spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Aerisi és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Aerisi té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Howling Defeat
entries: When Aerisi es queda a 0 punts de cop, her body disappears in a howling whirlwind that disperses quickly and harmlessly. Anything she is wearing or carrying is left behind.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Aerisi falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Windvane
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany perforant, o 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Bastian és Constitució ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Bastian és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guard fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the guard is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it {@condition prone}, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The priest fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the priest is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it {@condition prone}, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Bond of the Black Earth
entries: The burrowshark is magically bound to a bulette trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on its bulette, the burrowshark shares the bulette's senses and can ride the bulette while it burrows. The bonded bulette obeys the burrowshark's commands. If its mount dies, the burrowshark can train a new bulette to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The burrowshark fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

reaction.name: Unyielding
entries: When the burrowshark is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it {@condition prone}, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Sharktoothed Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans. Against a target is wearing no armor, the reaver deals an extra die of damage with this sword.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Bonded Mount
entries: The knight is magically bound to a beast with an innate swimming speed trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on this beast, the knight gains the beast's senses and ability to breathe underwater. The bonded mount obeys the knight's commands. If its mount dies, the knight can train a new beast to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu
entries: The knight deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the knight doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker the knight can see hits it with an attack, the knight can halve the damage against it.

trait.name: Action Surge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Indomable (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Recuperar l'Alè (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 ({@dice 1d10 + 11}) hit points.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Drannin wears a control amulet for his {@creature shield guardian} (see the Monster Manual) and a {@item ring of cold resistència}. He also carries a {@item potion of frost giant strength}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Drannin fa tres atacs with his greataxe.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Elizar és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Summon Mephits (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast {@spell convocar elementals menors}. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

action.name: Dagger +1
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Alè de Burning {@recharge 5}
entries: The minotaur exhales a cloud of burning embers en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a DC 14 Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Flaming Weapon (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc on a hit.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The guard fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Només Forma Humana)
headerEntries: The fathomer és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It has two 3rd-level spell slots, which it regains after finishing a short or long rest. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Shapechanger (2/Dia)
entries: The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked {@condition unconscious} or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to poison damage, as well as resistance to fire damage and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. It also has immunity to the following conditions: {@condition exhaustion}, {@condition grappled}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition prone}, {@condition unconscious}. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

trait.name: Olhydra's Armor (Només Forma Humana)
entries: The fathomer can cast {@spell armadura de mag} at will, without expending material components.

action.name: Constrict (Només en forma de Serpent)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained}, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.

action.name: Dagger (Només Forma Humana)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The knight és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 1. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). It knows the following sorcerer spell:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The knight fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Fennor fa dos atacs with her espasa gran

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The flamewrath és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

spells: {@spell escut de foc} (see Wreathed in Flame)

trait.name: Wreathed in Flame
entries: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the {@spell escut de foc} spell has a duration of "fins que sigui dissipat." The escut de foc burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Gar és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Gar pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Gar falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Caminar per l'Aigua
entries: Gar pot moure's i quedar-se sobre superfícies líquides com si fossin sòlides.

trait.name: Mort passada per Aigua
entries: Quan en Gar es queda a 0 punts de cop, el seu cos es torna aigua fosca que es dispersa ràpidament.Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

action.name: Drown
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de fred.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Mig Amfibi
entries: Ghald pot respirar aire i a l'aigua, però ha de submergir-se cada 4 hores per evitar sufocar-se.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu
entries: Ghald deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ghald fa tres atacs, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

monster.name: Hellenrae
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her salvar per Destresa to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

trait.name: Stunning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: When Hellenrae hits a target with a atac armat melé, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Saviesa modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Hellenrae fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Parry and Counter
entries: Hellenrae adds 3 to her AC against one melee or atac armat a distància that would hit her. To do so, she must be able to sense the attacker with her visió a cegues. If the attack misses, Hellenrae can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within her reach.

trait.name: Guiding Wind (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The initiate pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The priest és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The priest pot aguantar la respiració durant 30 minuts.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The priest makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The hurricane és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 3. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While the hurricane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 15 feet (included in its speed).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hurricane fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: When the hurricane is hit by a atac armat a distància, it reduces the damage from the attack by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the hurricane can catch the missile if it is small enough to hold in one hand and the hurricane has at least one hand free.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Imix és Carisma ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Imix's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de Imix, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de foc, and flammable objects in the aura que ningú estigui portant o vestint ignite. A creature also takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de foc if it touches Imix or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Imix moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Imix are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to him

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: Imix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: Imix desprèn llum forta en un radi de 60 peus i llum tènue uns 60 peus adicionals.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Imix falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Imix té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Imix makes two slam attacks or two flame blast attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Flame Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} a impactar, 250 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Dia)
entries: Imix summons up to three {@creature fire elemental||fire elementals} and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Imix, and disappear if Imix is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Heat Wave
entries: Imix creates a blast of heat within 300 feet of himself. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea in physical contact with metal objects (for example, carrying metal weapons or wearing metal armor) takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de foc. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea that isn't resistant or immune to fire damage ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or gain one level of {@condition exhaustion}.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Imix magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Imix is wearing or carrying isn't teleported with him.

legendary.name: Combustion (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Imix causes one creature he can see within 30 feet of him to burst into flames. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}. Si falla, rep 70 ({@damage 20d6}) de dany de foc and catches fire. A target on fire takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc when it starts its turn, and remains on fire until it or another creature takes an action to douse the flames. Si supera, l'objectiu rep la meitat del dany and doesn't catch fire.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Lyzandra és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Earthen Defeat
entries: When Marlos es queda a 0 punts de cop, his body transforms into mud and collapses into a pool. Anything he is wearing or carrying is left behind.

trait.name: Earth Passage
entries: Marlos can move in difficult terrain composed of anything made from earth or stone as if it were normal terrain. He can move through solid earth and rock as if it were difficult terrain. If he ends his turn there, he is shunted into the nearest space he last occupied.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Marlos falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Mirada Petrificant
entries: When a creature that can see Marlos's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of him, Marlos can force it to make a {@dc 14} Constitució saving throw if Marlos isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Si falla per menys es comença a tornar de pedra i està {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the {@spell restabliment superior} spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Marlos fins a l'inici del seu següent torn, when it can decide to avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Marlos in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If Marlos sees himself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of him and in an area of bright light, Marlos is, due to his curse, affected by his own gaze.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Marlos makes three melee attacks, one with his snake hair and two with Ironfang.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Ironfang
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de tro.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Miraj és Constitució ({@dc 14} salvació de conjur). He pot llançar aquest conjur innatament, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Miraj is an 11th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Earth Walk
entries: Moving through difficult terrain made of earth or stone costs Miraj no extra movement.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dos mans.

items.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 50 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} (CD 15 per escapar). Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on Força checks and Força saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target. A creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc each time it ends its turn grappled by the roper.

items.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Ogrémoch's habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Ogrémoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Ogrémoch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Ogrémoch té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Ogrémoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and atacs armats a distància.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ogrémoch makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Boulder
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 500 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}46 ({@damage 7d10 + 8}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 23} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Dia)
entries: Ogrémoch summons up to three {@creature earth elemental||earth elementals} and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogrémoch, and disappear if Ogrémoch is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Illuminating Crystals
entries: Ogrémoch's crystalline protrusions flare. Each creature within 30 feet of Ogrémoch becomes outlined in orange light, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

legendary.name: Stomp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Ogrémoch stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 30-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that radius ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23} or fall {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Create Gargoyle (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Ogrémoch's hit points are reduced by 50 as he breaks off a chunk of his body and places it on the ground in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of him. The chunk of rock instantly transforms into a {@creature gargoyle} and acts on the same initiative count as Ogrémoch. Ogrémoch can't use this action if he has 50 hit points or fewer. The gargoyle obeys Ogrémoch's commands and fights until destroyed.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Olhydra és Carisma ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Olhydra's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Olhydra falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Olhydra té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: Olhydra can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. She pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Olhydra makes two slam attacks or two water jet attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.

action.name: Water Jet
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany contundent, and the target is knocked {@condition prone} if it fails a {@dc 19} Força saving throw.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Dia)
entries: Olhydra summons up to three {@creature water elemental||water elementals} and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Crush
entries: One creature that Olhydra is grappling is crushed for 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

legendary.name: Fling (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Olhydra releases one creature she is grappling by flinging the creature up to 60 feet away from her, in a direction of her choice. If the flung creature comes into contact with a solid surface, such as a wall or floor, the creature takes {@dice 1d6} de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was flung.

legendary.name: Water to Acid (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Olhydra transforms her watery body into acid. This effect lasts until Olhydra's next turn. Any creature that comes into contact with Olhydra or hits her with a melee attack while standing within 5 feet of her takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany d'àcid. Any creature {@condition grappled} by Olhydra takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany d'àcid at the start of its turn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The one-eyed shiver és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Chilling Mist
entries: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Eye of Frost
entries: The one-eyed shiver casts {@spell ray of frost} from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also {@condition restrained}. A target {@condition restrained} in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a {@dc 13} Força check.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Oreioth és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Grim Harvest
entries: Un cop per torn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

trait.name: Swift Animation (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast {@spell animar els morts} on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Searing Armor
entries: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or {@condition grappled} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc at the end of that creature's turn.

trait.name: Shrapnel Explosion
entries: When the razerblast es queda a 0 punts de cop, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany perforant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The razerblast fa tres atacs melé.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac melé, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Renwick is an 18th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

trait.name: Unarmored Movement
entries: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The monk fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The monk adds 2 to its AC against one melee or atac armat a distància that would hit it. To do so, the monk must see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Shoalar és Constitució ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Shoalar és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Shoalar pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The Skyweaver és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 6. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The Stonemelder és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Cadàver Detonant
entries: When the Stonemelder dies, it turns to stone and explodes in a burst of rock shards, becoming a smoking pile of rubble. Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany contundent; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Black Earth Rod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing {@dice 2d8} de dany contundent for a 1st level slot, plus an additional {@dice 1d8} for each level of the slot above 1st.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Thurl és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Thurl fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Thurl adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Thurl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Vanifer és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Funeral Pyre
entries: When Vanifer es queda a 0 punts de cop, her body is consumed in a flash of fire and smoke. Anything she was wearing or carrying is left behind among ashes.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si Vanifer falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Vanifer fa dos atacs.

action.name: Tinderstrike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Wiggan és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: Wiggan té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Wiggan fa dos atacs with his wooden cane.

action.name: Wooden Cane
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar ({@hit 4} a impactar amb shillelagh), 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent amb shillelagh.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Windharrow is an 8th-level spellcaster. His habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris de bard següents:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Windharrow té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Windharrow fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Yan-C-Bin's habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Air Form
entries: Yan-C-Bin can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema if air could pass through that space.

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Yan-C-Bin's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Yan-C-Bin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Yan-C-Bin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Yan-C-Bin makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) de dany de força mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Thundercrack (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a terrible thundercrack in a 100-foot-radius sphere centered on himself. All other creatures in the area ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 24} or take 31 ({@damage 9d6}) de dany de tro and be {@condition deafened} for 1 minute. Qui superi en rep la meitat i està {@condition deafened} until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

action.name: Summon Elementals (1/Dia)
entries: Yan-C-Bin summons up to three {@creature air elemental||air elementals} and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Yan-C-Bin, and disappear if Yan-C-Bin is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary.name: Peal of Thunder
entries: Yan-C-Bin unleashes a peal of thunder that can be heard out to a range of 300 feet. Each creature within 30 feet of Yan-C-Bin takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de tro.

legendary.name: Teleportar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Yan-C-Bin magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Yan-C-Bin is wearing or carrying is teleported with him.

legendary.name: Suffocate (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Yan-C-Bin steals the air of one breathing creature he can see within 60 feet of him. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21}. Si falla, the target es queda a 0 punts de cop and is dying. On a successful save, the target can't breathe or speak fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant.
